SELECT CONCAT(t.uri, "==", UPPER(t.method)) AS url, GROUP_CONCAT(role.code ORDER BY t.uri) AS needRoles FROM sys_resource t INNER JOIN sys_role_resource rr ON t.id = rr.resource_id INNER JOIN sys_role role ON rr.role_id = role.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.`type` = 2 GROUP BY t.uri, t.id ORDER BY url DESC
SELECT t.* FROM sys_resource t INNER JOIN sys_role_resource rr ON t.id = rr.resource_id INNER JOIN sys_role role ON rr.role_id = role.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND role.id = #{id}

SELECT re.* FROM sys_user u JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id=ur.user_id JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id=r.id JOIN sys_role_resource rr ON r.id= rr.role_id JOIN sys_resource re ON rr.resource_id=re.id WHERE u.id=#{userId} AND re.type=1
